Pre-Game Insights: New Zealand have played 8 matches in the series and they are currently ranked fourth on the points table, while Sri Lanka have also played 8 matches in the series and they are currently ranked ninth on the points table.

Both teams last played against each other in the 3rd ODI of the Sri Lanka in New Zealand, 3 ODI Series, 2023 where Matt Henry scored the highest fantasy points for New Zealand with 109 match fantasy points while Dasun Shanaka topped the fantasy points leaderboard for Sri Lanka with 82 match fantasy points.
In the last match played by New Zealand against Pakistan, Pakistan beat New Zealand by 21 runs (D/L method). The top fantasy player for New Zealand was Rachin Ravindra who scored 139 fantasy points.
In their last match in this series against Bangladesh, Bangladesh beat Sri Lanka by 3 wickets. The top fantasy player for Sri Lanka was Charith Asalanka who scored 154 fantasy points.

The pitch at the M. Chinnaswamy Stadium, Bengaluru is a balanced pitch. The average 1st innings score at this venue in the last 20 matches is 250 runs. Chasing a target should be the preferred option at the venue, since the team batting first has only won 30% of its matches.
Temperature is expected to be around 25.19 °C and humidity is expected to be around 74%. 4.28 m/s winds are expected. Light rain is forecasted which may affect playing conditions.
In the 101 matches played between these 2 teams, New Zealand Batters have earned the most fantasy points for their team, while All Rounders have earned the most fantasy points for Sri Lanka.
